website_summaries.verdict: A nice bright light for under the cabinet particularly if you need a longer option.
pros: Also comes in a brown casing
Nice warm color but can be very bright if needed
Offers a lot of light for only 8 watts of power usage
cons: Know what you are doing before you try to install

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, warm light. Easy install for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying this light because of reviews saying the install was very difficult, but it was a breeze for me. I'm not an expert, either: thirty years old, female, not particularly strong but I know my way around tools. I've installed and repaired a couple ceiling fans, and have installed some track lighting. This was easier than most of those projects. I installed this on the bottom of a kitchen cupboard and everything went smoothly! The instructions are not super detailed, and maybe that's where others ran into trouble. But if you have a general knowledge of electric and light installation, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: HanamarmaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for our fluorescent models
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for our fluorescent models. Note this is hard wired and some of the negative reviewers obviously did not know what that meant. We had mini fluorescent models installed in our kitchen and swapped them out for these and added a dimmer and couldn't be happier. The color is much warmer than fluorescent but not as warm as dimmed halogen. Still, they are a much more natural color and being dimable is great. Installation was easy, the units have knock-out holes on the back and ends for the wiring and each included one strain relief.
customer_reviews.author: GRM

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install,  just takes patience
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a fluorescent undercabinet light with this fixture. It was a bear to install since you're working upside down, and it takes patience. When I got frustrated I took a coffee break. Plan on two hours from opening the box to turning it on. Installation is straight forward, just takes time and patience. The final result is worth it. The LED light is wonderful in the kitchen - bright and probably won't be replaced again in my lifetime. I'm going to replace the rest of my undercabinet fixtures with LED's.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Chance

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Direct-Wired Under-Cabinet Lights
customer_reviews.text: I've installed these under-cabinet lights in both my kitchen and wet-bar area. They are slightly more expensive than some similar fixtures but well worth the price difference. They are easy to install and provide bright dim-able lighting. The frosted lens diffuses the multiple LED's to provide a continuous blanket of lights across the entire depth of the under-cabinet counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: pstclair

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but beware dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a fluorescent tube style under cabinet light with one of these and love the light. Matches the kitchen granite countertops and the backsplash color pretty well (3000K). HOWEVER, LEDs have a "ballast" too and it's contained in the fixture and the fixture is pretty thin so if you're not careful, the wire coming out from the wall COULD end up entering the fixture right where their ballast is located and trust me - there isn't enough room! . . unless you're using three separate wires from conduit or a loom. . . . . don't ask me how I know that . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Dadrock33

customer_reviews.title: Install and engineering issues
customer_reviews.text: Installation of what should have been the hard part was easy, but popping in the LED is way harder than it needs to be (silly design) The screws holding the mounting plate need larger heads or lock washers. They are too small and I added washers. The screws on the wire holder were waaaayyy too long. It's brighter than it should be and the power switch should be a two brightness level switch. It probably cost GE $5 to make this thing in China, so it's overpriced but Home Depot sells the exact light for the same price. I learned enough that if I have to do another it would be much easier. I guess GE engineers arn't too "bright"...
customer_reviews.author: Hollywoody

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older, fluorescent light with this LED. Much nicer, evenly distributed light. Module is very light and relatively easy to install. I liked this so much I am replacing all of my undermount cabinet lights with these.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for old Florescent Fixture.
customer_reviews.text: The unit was fairly easy to install. Good instructions, but a bit hard to read (small print). I was surprised at how bright and true to color temp this one is!! I still have 4 more units to replace and I chose this brand/model because they have all the other sizes that I am going to need. I didn't want to mix different brands or styles. One company's rendition of 3000oK can be different than anothers. It would be immediately noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaart Skarsgård

customer_reviews.title: Good Light, Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: It puts out good light, maybe too much. The design is absurd. There is hardly enough room in the housing for the wires. The actual LED part is much more compact than comparable florescent fixtures that it replaces so they should have allowed enough room for an easy install. I guess this is just another example of the designers being on another continent than production and probably never saw the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!  Radio signal interference
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice light, it does what it's supposed to but; after a few months it started interfering with radio reception on all but the closest radio stations. I used this light over the kitchen sink and if, while in the kitchen, I want to listen to any radio stations that are farther than 10 miles away I have to turn off the light. I guess it's not a big deal, but come on... I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Semmel

customer_reviews.title: Lens broke when installing
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is fine- very bright though. But when installing the lens needs to be bent to squeezze into the casing. When this was done the lens snapped. Amazon says to contact GE for support but GE was no help. They sent me to another company- Flourolite Plastics-which didn't answer the phone. Now we are stuck with an installed light and no cover
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: I replaced 5 under cabinet lighting. First one was no problem, but when you do the next since they are operating from a wall switch, the opening in the back where you run the wires threw are way to small. I had to cut the metal to make the opening bigger which wasn't so easy. I also switched the wall switch to a dimmer because these lights are so bright, which is awesome but for evening the dimmer was needed. Wouldn't hesitate to buy these again. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up a kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Lights worked fine. We used 5 under kitchen cabinets and they provide excellent lighting. A little on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Good fixture, install a bit of a pain, but to be expected for direct wire fixture.
customer_reviews.text: This light produces a nice soft white light. I bought this to replace a florescent fixture above my kitchen sink. This light was a pain to install. It had to be completely disassembled. I also had to drill out the hole for the wiring to be bigger so I could reuse the existing wiring. However once installed it's looks very and hopefully this will last 20+ years like my old fixture.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Installation may be a little tricky but a great light
customer_reviews.text: Read the installation comments in the reviews to learn a few tricks. The light is great once you get the installation down.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Efficiency of products
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in den at my desk it works fine, it was so bright that I had to add a piece of molding to block the light from shinning in my eyes. All is well and I believe I'm saving some money using LED.
customer_reviews.author: John Ricciardi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I used these in the kitchen. They are a little difficult to install but it’s due to their size. The biggest complaint I have is I bought them because they said the color was bright white and they aren’t. They are actually more of a yellowish color. The electrician already had all of them installed or I would have returned them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee

customer_reviews.title: Bright dimmable lights at a fair cost
customer_reviews.text: Love these light, they work great on a dimmer. Install was straight forward. I almost didn’t buy because of other reviews stating how hard the install was, but there were no problems. Routing wire nuts to the available open space was the only thing that presented a challenge, but that is to be expected with any electrical work. I Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: best yet
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all the Florissant lights under our cabinets and added a dimmer switch. Now we have three times the light that we had with our old lights. The LED lights have no bulbs to replace and they are BRITE WHITE LIGHTS.
customer_reviews.author: David Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Replaced all my kitchen fluorescent lights with these. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced all my kitchen fluorescent lights with these. They work very well. But note they are more on the yellowish than the ones they replaced. Being able to dim them is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Moose Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Completed the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I am an electrician so installation was not an issue. Had been searching for a 48 inch LED that was not industrial white light. This one fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Very good light.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light. I ordered it for under my kitchen counter. It was reasonably easy to install, but does require a little knowledge and skill in installing lighting. I could not do it. Had to enlist the bro in law. It gives a nice bright natural light and does not show under the counter.
customer_reviews.author: DMarie

customer_reviews.title: Works under the cabinet well
customer_reviews.text: BUT I had electrician install as it's not easy. Pleased with the fixture - provides great lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for stringing together but can be done
customer_reviews.text: I had to adapt to string a few of these in succession. Doable by using the knockouts on either end, if you know how to do basic wiring. But the romex connector is a hard size to find (not at local hardware or big box story; available from electric supply house) and comes with only one. But otherwise very satisfied with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Warm Color, Dims Well
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically appealing warm white, and dims well with a Lutron C L dimmer. I tried a Leviton dimmer, which did not work. Has been in place for a month now, and working as desired.
customer_reviews.author: mrbill

customer_reviews.title: extremely low quality components and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This product died after less than 9 months. The unit has shorted out inside as one of the wires that connects to the internal led strip has arced with the frame of the unit. This is pathetic, a high school student could build a better under cabinet light with scraps from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Warm white, no flicker with dimmer
customer_reviews.text: Good warm white, dims with Lutron dimmer. Bright and does not flicker. This is the fifth GE undercabinet light I have purchased. Very happy with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: mrbill

customer_reviews.title: Good fixture but hard to get wiring to fit inside .
customer_reviews.text: Used for under cabinet light fixture. Good solid light fixture. Puts out good light. It is easy to mount to the cabinet. The only problem I had was there is not much room inside fixture to place the wiring. It is a very tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Light!
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a 12 inch LED direct wire light strip! Especially under $30! Found this in a 3000K and was very happy when it showed up. It has the push in style connectors for your electrical. My only complaint is that the area inside the light to store the wires is VERY small. Took a bit of elbow grease to get it to close. Overall, very good light!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Does not like AFCI breakers.
customer_reviews.text: These lights and the drivers will make an AFCI breaker trip instantly if you install them in an area of the home that requires AFCI breakers. As others have said as well, these are not easy to install and are time consuming. I have installed a lot of under cabinet lights and they are my least favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Just What The Cook Ordered
customer_reviews.text: The light arrived in good condition. As stated in the listing, the box was creased on one end but the light was in brand new condition. Installation was a challenge since it was installed over a kitchen sink. I intend to buy another light for under my kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: good lighting but some challenges in installation
customer_reviews.text: patience is must here. They were kinda easy to install, and they do give off good lighting. Pricing was good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement light , super bright under cabinets . Highly recommend this in the kitchen or garage .
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Difficult installation
customer_reviews.text: We hired someone to install these 2 lights under the counters in our newly remodeled kitchen. The hard wiring was already there from the previous lights so it should have been an easy task. I won’t repeat the words he used to descibe the design of the lights to create a difficult install. The lights are also way too bright for an under counter area. Now I will have to rehire the guy to put in a dimmer switch to make these useable. All the extra work and expensive needed to make these work make the purchase not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great LED upgrade
customer_reviews.text: These undercounter light fixtures are perfect as these are LED and should last for years without having to worry about replacing fluorescent bulbs or starters that burn out
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: Clean white light. Slim profile. Easy to mount. Sharp cut off. Snapping the plastic LED cover in place requires banging with hammer
customer_reviews.author: heymazda

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to install but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to install bc of the way the pieces fit together. It took two of us to get it lined up, but then the pieces snapped together quickly. The lights work great.
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily, is bright
customer_reviews.text: Put this in at a desk to replace an older fluorescent fitting. Had no issues installing it and it is bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Took a long time to install
customer_reviews.text: It is awkward to attach the fixture over the counter. I ended up having to lie down on the counter to do some of the work. I wasn't strong enough to get some of the pieces snapped together but my son was eventually able to do it. At one point, I was ready to jam it all back in the box and return it. It is very bright. I am thinking that I will put some colored translucent tape over part of it to soften it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Xmom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work & damaged
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to get around to putting this up. My mistake. When I opened it up, it was obvious that it had been opened before and had some damage. When I hooked it up, it pulsed on and off, plus some of the LEDs didn't come on. I should have been more on the ball! Too late to do anything about a credit/refund. :-{
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement and was worried about going from fluorescent to led but we love it! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awful to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is a nightmare to install. There isn't enough room in the under cabinet to house the wires, so it wouldn't click shut. We made the wires shorter and still had trouble. My dad is great with installing lighting and said this product was junk. I would have returned the three lights, but I needed the side punch option. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: great undercounter light fixture
customer_reviews.text: plenty of room to make us electrical joints and puts out a lot of light
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great but bad QA and hard install
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these. Uniform light, very bright if not dimmed. Wide range dimming performance. Does not flicker at any dimming level. Installation is not easy because of their low profile with very little room inside for wiring but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Vitarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only problem is drilling the hope for the hard wire.
customer_reviews.author: OPA

customer_reviews.title: Installation not as bad as the reviews say
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying these because of the reviews saying how hard the install was. But we installed two lights in about 20 minutes each, not to bad
customer_reviews.author: Francis J. Durocher

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best fluorescent light replacements. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S

customer_reviews.title: Bright and dims great.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and an excellent dimmer. Does not hum when dimmed at any level and dimmes to a very low level. We set it to 1% and use it as a night light for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: RandK_G

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: So happy to get these great lights. Lights up my counters perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hartman

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: provides a great light over my kitchen sink. it appears to draw a lot of power though when I thought I wouldn't even notice it on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Couture

customer_reviews.title: bought 8 at different sizes and they work great
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit, easy installation, great lighting level and sleek looking when installed
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: GE 36 Inch Premium Front Phase LED Light...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of light....works great...I'll need a dimmer to control the output....good product...fairly easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: moonwalk69

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lighting far brighter than fluorescents I had previously
customer_reviews.text: My electrician was so impressed with these he ought a bunch to use for other clients. Great LED lighting far brighter than fluorescents I had previously
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Is not a "Ready" to use item
customer_reviews.text: Power cord is not connected nor power cord is included. Unless you like to do wirings then buy it. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I returned this product cause I thought it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product cause I thought it was a light that had an edison connection. When it arrived it was something I needed to hardwire into my electrical system.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Runion

customer_reviews.title: Great under the counter light.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this under the counter light. It gives a very good light and is light and compact. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Ewins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wire in and install. Gives off great light
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable. Lost half LED output.
customer_reviews.text: This fixture lost half its light output in less than a year after installation. I assume there are two LED assemblies inside, one has failed.
customer_reviews.author: aardvark

customer_reviews.title: Love the warmth of the light
customer_reviews.text: replaced an old fluorescent fixture. Love the warmth of the light. Actually throws more light than the old fixture. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charles B Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Does not have center knockout on the 18 inch model
customer_reviews.text: The 18 inch version does not have a center knockout in the back. Additionally, one cannot cut a hole in the back center because the space is taken up by a rather large LED driver.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, metal frame, easy install, bright!
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal frame. Quality construction. Easy to install. Very bright!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: It works. Could use a front shield to reduce ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. Could use a front shield to reduce the lateral intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Croucher

customer_reviews.title: but it was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Still having put it up, but it was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynEN

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm light, feel cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is bright and has a nice warm light. While installation wasn't difficult, the lights appear to be be very cheaply made. I am disappointed at how thin and flimsy the fixture is considering the "Premium" product marketing and the price point. I hope that these last as long as the fluorescent fixtures they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Splinters McGee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: should have an outlet also to get 5 stars. but the lights are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Beno

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, bad design and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these 24 inch fixtures and one 18 inch fixture. Received them. Very poor design, hard to install due to poor design and poor quality of the fixture. Returned all four fixtures and spent two days with Amazon getting the proper credit on these fixtures. Do not order them, very cheap, poor design and way over priced!
customer_reviews.author: Wiped

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Install, Limited Dimming Range
customer_reviews.text: But I'm keeping it. Installation was tedious as others have noted, and the dimming range is limited, even when coupled with the Lutron Diva CL dimmer. It just doesn't dim sufficiently for me - or it flickers. As it is, the light hesitates on switching the switch, like an old-style fluorescent. I wouldn't buy again, and I'm to lazy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on Power
customer_reviews.text: Well I can't yet give a true assessment because the power is not back on at the house yet. Once Moma gets the money order to pay the power bill we will be bale to see it come on and I will let you know. I have high hopes for it!
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work; shorted out; too late to return for credit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and one did not work it shorted out and cannot be used. Unfortunately I did not find this out until the return period had expired. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: WOW these are cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: WOW these are cheaply made - They work, and like others say they are a PITA to install.
customer_reviews.author: THPSMR

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Only bad thing was lack of moving ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Only bad thing was lack of moving the hole for the wire to come into the housing.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews say, you basically have to take it apart to mount it. Note that there is a knock-out on one end for the cord grommet to fit thru. Works fine after you manage to get it installed. Plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Also liked that there was a opening in the middle for ...
customer_reviews.text: The fixture gives off just the right amount of light for above my kitchen sink. After reading others reviews thought the installation would be difficult, however I had no problems. The mounting was typical for any under cabinet light fixture. Also liked that there was a opening in the middle for the cable to go in rather than off to the side. Internal wiring comes equipped with quick connectors for the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Garbage design, garbage product
customer_reviews.text: Garbage design, garbage product. Difficult to open to hardwire, turned on and only super dim light came on, switch did not work. Could not return due to small return window
customer_reviews.author: JFKelly

customer_reviews.title: Great under cabinet light and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these last year and they were installed with a dimmer in October 2018. It's been 6 months and they are still working great. Good color and dims great! My tenant mistakenly thought there was something wrong, but he didn't realize someone flipped the individual switch on the unit to off. I contacted Jasco (the seller on Amazon for GE products) and they were fantastic!! They were fast about trying to resolve what the problem was. Luckily it was just user error!
customer_reviews.author: EM in WA

customer_reviews.title: LED tube light that dims perfectly
customer_reviews.text: While you do have to take it apart to complete wiring, just be patient. Once done, it works great and dims smoothly. I use it on top of a cabinet to provide indirect lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: GE 24 Inch LED Premium Under Cabinet Light Fixture, Direct Wire, Soft Warm White 3000K, 991 Lumens, Steel Housing, On/Off Switch, Perfect for Kitchen, Office, Garage, Barn, Workbench and More, 26742
product_meta.description: Size:24 InchAdd a light to the hard to see places in your kitchen with a premium LED direct wire light fixture from GE. Perfect for providing under cabinet lighting in your kitchen, home office, or studio, the 24-inch light fixture features full range front phase dimmability, helping you control the threshold of light in your home. Even though the fixture is a high-powered LED light source, it has minimal power consumption with a life of 50, 000 hours of LED power. The LED fixture is cool to the touch, will never overheat, provides an even diffused, soft white light, and there are no bulbs to replace. This metal fixtures includes all mounting hardware and instruction manual for easy installation. This product is UL listed and is backed by a lifetime .
feature_bullets: 2ft. Light Fixture – 24-Inch LED light bar has a high-quality steel housing and is in-wall dimmer compatible, making it a great under cabinet lighting solution or shop light

Direct Wire Fixture – Powered via direct wire and shines at high-powered bright 991 lumens. Works with most in wall dimmers, great for putting the finishing touch on a work area. This fixture is a direct-wire solution, installation by a professional electrician is recommended.
GE LED Lights – Long-life, energy-efficient LED lights mean no bulbs to replace.
Diffused LED Light – Fully diffused light means no hot spots; the light comes with an on/off switch built into the fixture.
Easy Install Light – This product is UL listed with a lifetime . Fully assembled and ready to install right from the box, hardware and instructions are included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars181 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
